abstract: In this paper, it is created a one-to-one map between the Dirac Equation in Matrix Algebra and the Dirac Equation in Geometric Algebra Cl(3,0). First, the Dirac Equation and the representation of the wavefunction in Geometric Algebra Cl(3,0) is obtained. The equivalent representation for standard Matrix Algebra is presented. And finally, a one-to-one mapping between both representations is obtained.
